title: What about 'Zero' Master Yi
body:
HEY ALL!

Whoever plays Borderlands, or played Bordlands understands what I'm saying!
If you have no idea who the heck Zero is, pls check.

replies.body:
Well in the game, 'Zero' was a mercenary, so making him 'Master Zi' would be mad, but idk if that'd fit under 'Zero'
If the skin were to be named, I'd go with 'Zero Yi', they did do that to another of his skins, 'Samurai Yi', but then again Samurai is another title for Master
He was my favourite character in borderlands, ohhh the snipz.
i remember dat, but then again.... I did play Zero through 'True Vault Hunter Mode' then defeated the very LAST boss, not the vault monster, the other thing

Could have crit animations be the same as the excecute ones, change the 0 on his head to a filled out Z (an o shaped like a z) when he does crit.

His e would change the colour of his blade and fore head symbol will change plus digital splash effects of 1s and 0s when he hits an enemy

Ult would leave a short trail of an ekko like blue haze with 1s and 0s trailing behind

W would have him balance on the tip of the sword as he is meditating

Quotes about the perfect kill when making a kill

recall animation would be yasuo style swinging sword around

other cool shi!
